customHeadContent:
<script type='text/javascript' src='/kinetic/app/bundles/data-viewer/request-ce-bundle-base/libraries/data-viewer/js/dataViewer.js'></script>
<!-- DataTables CSS-->
<link rel="stylesheet" type="text/css" href="/kinetic/app/thirdparty/datatables/media/css/jquery.dataTables.min.css"> 
<!--<link rel="stylesheet" type="text/css" href="/kinetic/app/thirdparty/datatables-responsive-plugin/dataTables.responsive.custom.css">-->
<link rel="stylesheet" type="text/css" href="https://cdn.datatables.net/responsive/2.0.0/css/responsive.dataTables.min.css">

<!-- DataTables JS-->
<script type='text/javascript' src='https://cdn.datatables.net/1.10.10/js/jquery.dataTables.min.js'></script>
<!--<script type='text/javascript' src="/kinetic/app/thirdparty/datatables-responsive-plugin/dataTables.responsive.js"></script>-->
<script type='text/javascript' src='https://cdn.datatables.net/responsive/2.0.0/js/dataTables.responsive.min.js'></script>

<style>
    .form-group.inline {
        display: inline;
    }
  .selected {
    background-color: #aab7d1;
}
</style>

<script>
  
$(document).ready(function() {  

});
searchConfig ={
    // Example of full configuration of a seach object to return results as a DataTable
    personSearchBridgeTable:{
        resource:{
            name: "All Submissions by Kapp",
        },
        data: [
            { 
                name: "id",
                title:"Id",
                class: "all",
            },
            { 
                name: "Submitted By",
                title:"Submitted By",
                class: "all",
            }, 
            { 
                name: "Submitted At",
                title:"Submitted At",
                class: "hidden",
            }, 
            { 
                defaultContent: 'This is static Text',
                title:"Static Text",
                class: 'hidden',
            },
        ],
        resultsContainerId: 'destinationTable',
        before: function(configObj){ 
            
        },
        success: function (configObj){
            
            console.log(this);
        },
        successEmpty: function(configObj){
            //Show Empty Table
            //DataViewer.Renderers.DataTables(configObj.destination, configObj);
            console.log(this);
        },
        error: function(configObj){
            
            console.log(this);
        },
        complete: function(configObj){
            
            console.log(this);
        },
        // Executes on click of element with class of select
        clickCallback: function(element, results){
                    element.toggleClass('selected');
        },
        removeOnClick: false,
        renderer: {
            type: DataViewer.Renderers.UnorderedList,
            /*type: DataViewer.Renderers.DataTables,*/ // Passing a function here allows for better customization
            options: {
                // Options for Reneder
                processSingleResult: false,
                // DataTable OPTIONS; Passing options here make it clear that they are being passed to data tables
                createdRow: function ( row, data, index ) {
                        
                        console.log('row created');
                },
            }
        },       
    },
}
</script>
name: Data Viewer - Two List Sample

elements.name: Instructions
elements.text:
Instructions

Move items between the left list to right list using the "Add" and "Remove" buttons. Values in the left (source) list come from submissions of this Form.

When the request is submitted the data from both lists will be converted to JSON and saved into the "source-json" and "destination-json" field.

events.name: Show List
